product_name: Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants - Women's Regular
long_description: The women's Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants with new NanoPro(TM) fabric are waterproof, windproof and more breathable than ever. Full-length side zips allow quick venting and on/off. NanoPro coated fabric is 43% more breathable than the previous PreCip technology, keeping you drier and more comfortable. Pants are lightweight, durable and compressible; 100% taped seams help seal out the elements. DryTouch finish next to the skin reduces condensation and that sticky, clammy feeling. Full-length side zippers have bonded storm flaps for weather protection. The women's Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants offer zippered hand pockets and a zippered back pocket. Elastic waist with drawcord fine-tunes the fit.
short_description: The women's Marmot PreCip Full-Zip Rain Pants with new NanoPro(TM) fabric are waterproof, windproof and more breathable than ever. Full-length side zips allow quick venting and on/off.
